_header: Abide at home as I thee couns[ ]
_description: Proverbial advice to stay at home rather than begin a journey — one couplet

NYPL120.Transcription:
A byde atome as I the couns[lost in gutter]ffor thy Iorney shall not
                    purvey
NYPL120.Note:
Added to right margin by original scribe, as a gloss beside Latin text
                    it translates.
